page.title: 18Recreation in Kirtlington
page.content: We carried out a survey that was completed by 61% of people living in Kirtlington. They appear to follow a wide variety of activities for their recreation. The most common hobbies in order of popularity are: Gardening, Swimming, Music, Cycling, Tennis, Equestrian Sports, Golf, Knitting, Photography, Squash, Water Sports (other than swimming), Running, Football, Cricket, Nature, Bird- watching, Darts, Fishing, Dress-making, "Computering", Skating (ice and roller), Bowls, Bell-ringing, Gymnastics, Dominoes, Hockey, Morris Dancing, Wine making, Tapestry, Television and Travelling. It is interesting that nearly half of these hobbies are sporting activities. We wonder if this will always be so.
